duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and repair coaches, documenting all work performed on a repair order.
Manage work assignment, including flag time, cause and correction documentation, and escalation to supervisors when repair time will exceed allotted time.
Perform Pre-Delivery Inspections to prepare an RV for customer delivery.
Inspect and complete battery maintenance, perform engine and generator oil changes, and perform chassis lube.
Inspect, diagnose, and determine repair or replacement of all major systems and components found in an RV, including brakes, hydraulic systems, air conditioners, and more.
Complete preventative maintenance on various RV components, such as fuel filters, air filters, hydraulic filters, and brakes.
Install RV accessories, including hitches, brake controllers, furniture, and more.
Perform tire and brake checks and ensure understanding and compliance with OEM and vendor warranty procedures.
Maintain a safe and clean work environment, ensure proper use, care, and storage of all tools and equipment, and provide high-quality repairs on all work assignments.
Attend all company-required meetings and training, and fulfill additional responsibilities as requested or required.
